Carutapera |nickname = |motto = |image_skyline = |imagesize = |image_caption = |image_flag = |image_seal = |image_map = Maranhao Municip Carutapera.svg |map_caption = Location of Carutapera |subdivision_type = [[List of countries|Country]] |subdivision_type1 = [[Regions of Brazil|Region]] |subdivision_type2 = [[States of Brazil|State]] |subdivision_name = {{flag|Brazil}} |subdivision_name1 = [[Northeast Region, Brazil|Northeast]] |subdivision_name2 = [[Image:Bandeira do Maranhão.svg|border|22px]] [[Maranhão]] |leader_title = [[Mayor]] |leader_name = Vitoria da Gloria de Oliveira Borges Alves |established_title = Founded |established_date = June 3, 1935 |area_magnitude = |area_total_km2 = 1255.555 |area_total_sq_mi = |area_land_km2 = |area_land_sq_mi = |area_water_km2 = |area_water_sq_mi = |area_water_percent = |area_urban_km2 = |area_urban_sq_mi = |area_metro_km2 = |area_metro_sq_mi = |population_as_of = 2008 |population_note = [http://www.ibge.gov.br/home/estatistica/populacao/estimativa2008/POP2008_DOU.pdf IBGE 2008 statistics] |population_total = 20905 |population_density_km2 = 16.4 |population_density_sq_mi = |population_metro = |population_density_metro_km2 = |population_density_metro_sq_mi = |population_urban = |timezone = [[UTC-3]] |utc_offset = -3 |timezone_DST = |utc_offset_DST = |coordinates = {{coord|01|11|42|S|46|01|12|W|region:BR|display=inline,title}} |elevation_m = |elevation_ft = |postal_code_type = |postal_code = |blank_name = '''[[Human Development Index|HDI]]''' (2000) |blank_info = 0.571 – medium{{cite web |url=http://www.pnud.org.br/atlas/ranking/IDH-M%2091%2000%20Ranking%20decrescente%20(pelos%20dados%20de%202000).htm |title=Archived copy |accessdate=2009-12-17 |url-status=dead |archiveurl=https://web.archive.org/web/20091003103229/http://www.pnud.org.br/atlas/ranking/IDH-M%2091%2000%20Ranking%20decrescente%20%28pelos%20dados%20de%202000%29.htm |archivedate=2009-10-03 }} - [[UNDP]] |website = [https://web.archive.org/web/20090614202038/http://www.carutapera.ma.gov.br/principal.htm www.carutapera.ma.gov.br] |footnotes = }} '''Carutapera''' is the northernmost city in the [[Brazil]]ian [[States of Brazil|state]] of [[Maranhão]]. == References == {{Reflist}} {{Municipalities of Maranhão}} [[Category:Populated places established in 1935]] [[Category:Populated coastal places in Maranhão]] [[Category:Municipalities in Maranhão]] {{Maranhão-geo-stub}}
